title: Firefox for Android 42.0.2 Release

notes.note:
Resolved MDNSD battery usage issues on some devices and some configurations ([1215012][1])


  [1]: https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1215012

text: We'd also like to extend a special thank you to all of the new Mozillians who contributed to this release of Firefox!
